person.persName: A. J. Oldham (Oldham County, Kentucky, merchant and court clerk)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, merchant and court clerk. Kentucky native. Secretary of the Democracy of Oldham County in 1858. Merchant in Oldham County in 1860. Clerk of the Oldham County Court in 1863 and 1864.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 14; "Democratic Meeting in Oldham," The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), November 19, 1858, p. 1; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Oldham County, KY, June 1863, p. 370, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
